Discuss various steps that developing countries such as India can take for protecting their environment without slowing the acceleration of development?

               "Change is the essence of life", a change that includes the positive growth is known as "Development". Development is the important aspect to the countries like India, in order to grow economically, socially, politically into a greater nation. Development causes some difficulties that effect the environment for a while but leads to a Developed nation. In order to protect the environment it is not necessary that to slowdown the acceleration of development. Instead of slowing the acceleration of development, some steps can be taken in order to protect the environment simultaneously develop the nation.

                There are various aspects that effects the environment. In order to protect the environment the preliminary step of understanding the factors that have influence on the environment should be performed. After analyzing the factors and their influence on the environment, the respective care should be taken to reduce the factors influence on the environment.

                Development is as much as important as protecting the environment for the nations like India. The following steps are to be taken inorder to protect the environment.

                 In the process of development in terms of means of communication like road ways, railways etc.,there will be effect to the environment in terms of traffic, sound pollution, dust, smoke etc.,. so in order to protect the environment the following specific measures have to be followed.

  • Like directing the traffic with strict rules can be done in order to reduce the traffic problems.
  • The dust ,smoke can be reduced by the usage of cleaning equipment like sweeping machines etc,.
  • In order to increase the oxygen and reduce the smoke that is caused due to processing of concretes ..etc., trees should be grown which protects the environment.
  • In order to reduce the sound pollution, new equipment that does with less noise are to be utilized.
  • In order to reduce the traffic problems, the equipment, raw materials like sand, stones etc., are to be allowed on the roads only in night time and other hours where the traffic is low compared to peak hours.

               In the process of development in the terms of increasing the infrastructures like construction of  shopping malls, buildings etc., the following steps are to be taken so as to protect the environment.

  • The building are to be constructed in an area that causes less problem to the human in the environment. 
  •  A proper care has to be taken in reducing the destruction to the trees and natural habitat.
  •  With the name of  go green, greenery has to be increased by planting the plants and doing the bonsai cultivation as a hobby to the employees in that particular organization.

            In the process of development, in terms of using eco friendly products like paper rather than using the plastics will make the country developed, but it will reduce the trees as raw materials for paper will be the trees.so the recycling and reusing of the paper should be done.

           The development can be done simultaneously by protecting the environment. In protecting the environment and for the successful development process of the nation the role of humans is very crucial. population is more in developing countries like India which is thought to be weakness or a problem for rapid development, but in reality it is the strength of the nation which can drive towards the objective of development. Thus development can be done by protecting the environment which can happen by following steps that are to followed by the driving force(population)

  • Every individual should to be given education regarding the traffic rules that are to be followed in the developing roads.
  • Increasing greenery should be taken as a hobby and duty of every individual, so that they can do whatever they can for reducing the pollution. 
  • The workmen in the constructions should  be given  education on safety measures that are to be followed in order to reduce the factors that effect the environment.

             Thus by following the above measures strictly and by taking the preventive actions developing countries like India can protect their environment without slowing the acceleration of development. Vision of Developed Nation is not just merely a night mare its the reality that will happen in future which is not so far. Development along with  protecting the environment will make the reality to happen sooner.
